rules.active: Blind everyone within 3 metres with bean juice.

details.flavour: Industrial Grade

rules.active: Summon a cast-steel anvil into existence above target character's head.

details.flavour: meep meep

rules.active: Choose a visible article of clothing. A snake appears inside of it.

details.flavour: "Always drink upstream from the herd" - The Sherrif

rules.active: Throw a pair of bola around a visible target

details.flavour: "Bolas are excellent for capturing large mammals, like my portly friend Steve"

rules.active: Put a large object or willing NPC in your hand.

details.flavour: Brilliant for barging, barrowing, borrowing, bearing, busing, and bumming.

rules.active: Cast a handful of sand and pocket lint into the air before you.

details.flavour: Good for blinding a close range target.

rules.active: Choose a Blue or Green card in your hand. All cards in your hand become copies of that card.

details.flavour: Fax is short for facsimile, meaning "make similar".

rules.active: Target visible character will take 25 damage the next time they rest.

details.flavour: Sweet dreams.

rules.active: Target willing character ceases to exist for up to 1 hour. They return to the last spot they existed in afterwards.

details.flavour: "Have a vision. It is the ability to see the invisible. If you can see the invisible, you can achieve the impossible." - Byron Fex, Blind Monk
"Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did."  - Gregor the Delegator

rules.active: Choose X up to 5. An boundary, impenetrable from within, is placed X squares away from you in all directions as long as you'd like

details.flavour: "Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door." - Gredge Putley, Future Pickaxe Owner

rules.active: Target a doorway. The next living creature to pass through the door remains stuck in the frame until they take damage.

details.flavour: "You make a better door than a window" - Jimmy Paxton, Obstructed Individual

rules.active: Stand atop an object. Your character and the object are flung in the direction of your choice until obstructed.

details.flavour: You'd have gotten off on the wrong foot with whoever set off on the journey of a thousand steps.

rules.active: Flip a coin in place of your next roll. Heads for a critical success, tails for a critical failure.

details.flavour: "I will never abide by absolutes" - Leopold the Oppugnant

rules.active: Learn the current location of an item you've touched in the past.

details.flavour: At last, the location of the missing socks.

rules.active: The ground shakes beneath you. All characters within 4 metres are knocked airborne.

details.flavour: Not suitable for tectonic fault zones.

details.rules: Attacks deal double damage until you play your next card.
details.flavour: I'm not unarmed, I've got two of them.

details.rules: Flip a coin. Heads: Deal 15 damage to visible target. Tails: Gun backfires, take 5 damage.
details.flavour: To get you out of a tight spot, like a colonial insurrection or a duel.

details.rules: Choose a 2x2 area to fill temporarily with an opaque smoke
details.flavour: Mildly anoxic.

details.rules: Pick a tile up to 2 tiles away. The next charcter to walk on this tile will fall over.
details.flavour: Nothing like a little prop humour.

details.rules: Possess a non-magic object within 5 tiles of your body until you lose concentration.
details.flavour: "There's something rather... lively, about this chair" - General Kudzo

details.rules: Summon a diembodied hand within 4 tiles to perform one simple action before vanishing.
details.flavour: "Magicians are a bunch of lazy bums" - Brinley B.

details.rules: Choose two visible points. You will be alerted the next time an NPC walks between them.
details.flavour: Mafia hideouts are often mysteriously empty when Rebel forces arrive to perform arrests.

details.rules: A magical light takes the shape of a cannon and instantly fires a real shot in the direction of your choice.
details.flavour: Cannonballs are designed to destroy ships and stone fortresses. The effect they have on the human body is unspeakable.

details.rules: A visible character of your choice receives a sandwich to the face.
details.flavour: After taking a sandwich to the face from one of his men, Coronel Kudzo was forced to retire, effective immediately

details.rules: Targeted NPC becomes stuck in place for ten seconds.
details.flavour: Have my legs always been this heavy?

details.rules: Cover a non-magic object in a thin layer of ice.
details.flavour: Whoa, chill.

details.rules: You and any character you are touching burst into flames. 3d6 damage to each character ignited.
details.flavour: I'm taking you straight to hell.

details.rules: Touch an NPC to freeze both of you. Until your hand is removed, neither of you can attack or perform actions
details.flavour: Let's savour this moment forever.

details.rules: Summon a pigeon to perform one simple task
details.flavour: Will try not to be distracted by breadcrumbs.

details.rules: Summons a slice of toast the size of a door
details.flavour: Roughly 13000 calories.

details.rules: Your next melee attack deals an additional d6 and sets your target on fire.
details.flavour: "I'm about to turn your Kitchen Dream into a Kitchen Nightmare" - Diner Employee Sr.
